sen.e: After MINAMOTO no Sanetomo was assassinated in 1219, the Hojo Clan who served as a regent for Shogun (Shikken) intended to install an imperial family member as Shogun, but Cloistered Emperor Go-Toba rejected it.

sen.j: そのため源頼朝の妹の曾孫である頼経が鎌倉に迎え入れられた。
sen.e: Thus Yoritsune, a great-grandson of MINAMOTO no Yoritomo's sister, was brought into Kamakura.

sen.e: He was a puppet Shogun set up by the Hojo Clan at first, but as he got older and reached higher rank, the opponents of the Hojo Clan approached him, and he gradually enhanced his power base within the Shogunate.
